review: The game is so pointless, it's amazingly fun!! How many ways does this game end...

Only Played for a day so far, but this is a great game. Anyone who has played Need For Speed: Most Wanted (2012) will find farmiliar elements in this game. A load of fun, with awesome jumps, smashable billboards and collectables. The original Need For Speed: Most Wanted from Criterion Games.
Good Fun!! Buy while on Sale!
